author:
Michael Marot                                                    
                            AP
title: Oladipo, dealing with his second major layoff in 14 months, can't wait to get back on the court
description: Fourteen months after suffering a serious knee injury, Victor Oladipo is back home in Miami again, doing what he can to be ready when games resume.
content:
INDIANAPOLIS Victor Oladipo was just rounding into form when the NBA season was suspended.
His expected increased playing time, his hopes of chasing a home playoff series and taking the Indiana Pacers on a deep postseason run went on hold at least a few more… [+2873 chars]
